section.title: bills of materials copying of Copy Bill of Materials
section.para: To make a copy of a Bill of Materials, select the "Copy Bill of Materials" option. The following screen will appear:
When copying a Bill of Materials, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Enter the Item Number of the manufactured Item whose Bill of Materials you want to copy.
Displays Inventory UOM automatically when Item Number is entered into "Item Number" field. The Item description will also appear.
Enter the Item Number of the manufactured Item whose Bill of Materials you wish to create by this copy.
Displays Inventory UOM automatically when Item Number is entered into "Item Number" field. The Item description will also appear.

section.para: To the far right of the screen, the following buttons are available:

listitem.para: Closes the screen without executing the copy command, returning you to the application desktop.
